text: yO vA aya#thAdEvataM ~Myaqj~jamu#paqcaraqtyA dEqvatA$ByO vRuScyatEq pApI#yAn Bavatiq yO ya#thAdEvaqtanna dEqvatA$Byaq A vRu#ScyatEq vasI#yAn BavatyAgnEqyyarcA &&gnI$ddhramaqBi mRu#SEd vaiShNaqvyA ha#viqrddhAna#mAgnEqyyA srucO# vAyaqvya#yA vAyaqvyA$nyaindriqyA sadO# yathAdEvaqtamEqva yaqj~jamupa# caratiq na dEqvatA$Byaq A vRu#ScyatEq vasI#yAn Bavati yuqnajmi# tE pRuthiqvIM jyOti#ShA saqha yuqnajmi# vAqyumaqntari#kShENa - [  ]   17
